amendment.description: An amendment numbered 84 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to increase and decrease funding by $2,000,000 for Byrne Justice Assistance Grants Memorial funding to support community-based violence prevention programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pressley amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A036) offered by Ms. Pressley.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pressley amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.
